original: @ga_@#/_/_u :gyi 'od zer can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs/
analyzed: @ga_@#/_/_u :gyi 'od zer can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs/
translated: The Sadhana of Marici🔽In Sanskrit: Udiyana-marici-sadhana

original: @#/_/rgya gar skad du/_u di ya na ma ri tshi sa d+ha nam/_bod skad du/
analyzed: @#/_/rgya gar skad du/_u di ya na ma ri tshi sa d+ha nam/_bod skad du/
translated: In Tibetan: ud-krun-gyi 'od-zer-can-gyi sgrub-pa'i thabs

original: u skrun gyi 'od zer can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs/_'phags ma 'od zer can la phyag
analyzed: u skrun gyi 'od zer can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs/_'phags ma 'od zer can la phyag
translated: Homage to the noble Marici.🔽After confessing one's sins by the rite taught previously, one should

original: 'tshhal lo/_/sngon du bstan pa'i cho gas sdig pa bshags pa'i rjes su stong pa nyid🔽rnam par bsgoms la/_sna tshhogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la mam gi sa bon dmar po
analyzed: 'tshhal lo/_/sngon du bstan pa'i cho gas sdig pa bshags pa'i rjes su stong pa nyid rnam par bsgoms la/_sna tshhogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la mam gi sa bon dmar po
translated: meditate on emptiness.🔽On a variegated lotus and sun disk, the red seed syllable mam

original: yongs su gyur pa las u u gyi 'od zer can mdog dmar ba/_zhal drug pa
analyzed: yongs su gyur pa las u u gyi 'od zer can mdog dmar ba/_zhal drug pa
translated: transforms into red Marici, with six faces,

original: phyag bcu gnyis pa zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum mo/_/dmar po dang /_nag po
analyzed: phyag bcu gnyis pa zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum mo/_/dmar po dang /_nag po
translated: twelve arms, and three eyes in each face.🔽The five faces to the right are red, black,

original: dang /_dkar po dang /_ljang gu dang /_ser po ni g.yas skor du zhal lnga'o//
analyzed: dang /_dkar po dang /_ljang gu dang /_ser po ni g.yas skor du zhal lnga'o//
translated: white, green, and yellow.🔽The face above is a black face of a pig.

original: steng du ni phag zhal nag po'o/_/dang po g.yas kyi phyag drug tu go rims bzhin
analyzed: steng du ni phag zhal nag po'o/_/dang po g.yas kyi phyag drug tu go rims bzhin
translated: The first six right hands hold, in order,

original: du ral gri dang /_'khor lo dang /_gtun shing dang /_mda' dang /_dgra
analyzed: du ral gri dang /_'khor lo dang /_gtun shing dang /_mda' dang /_dgra
translated: sword,🔽discus,🔽pestle,🔽arrow,🔽enemy,🔽

original: sta dang /_rdo rje rtshe gcig pa'o/_/g.yon gyi phyag rnams su sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang /_kha tam ga dang /_thod pa dang /_mya ngan med🔽u gyi gyi 'od zer can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs🔽pa'i yal ga dang /_tshhangs pa'i mgo bo dang /_gzhu dang rtshe gsum mo/_/🔽mchod rten gyi nang na gnas pa/_klu'i dbang po brgyad kyis sku brgyan pa/_skra🔽kham pa gyen du bsgreng ba/_zhal mche ba gtshigs pa/_mgo bo skam po brgyad🔽kyis dbu brgyan pa/_mgo bo rlon pa'i phreng ba ske ba nas 'chang ba/_rin po
analyzed: sta dang /_rdo rje rtshe gcig pa'o/_/g.yon gyi phyag rnams su sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang /_kha tam ga dang /_thod pa dang /_mya ngan med u gyi gyi 'od zer can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs pa'i yal ga dang /_tshhangs pa'i mgo bo dang /_gzhu dang rtshe gsum mo/_/ mchod rten gyi nang na gnas pa/_klu'i dbang po brgyad kyis sku brgyan pa/_skra kham pa gyen du bsgreng ba/_zhal mche ba gtshigs pa/_mgo bo skam po brgyad kyis dbu brgyan pa/_mgo bo rlon pa'i phreng ba ske ba nas 'chang ba/_rin po
translated: In the right hands are a sword, a discus, a pestle, an arrow, a battle-ax, a vajra, and a single-pointed spear. In the left hands are a lasso with a threatening forefinger, a khaṭvāṅga, a skull cup, an ashoka branch, a human head, a bow, and a sword.

original: che mang pos spras pa'i shing rta sna tshhogs pa phag pa bdun la chibs pa/_phyi rol
analyzed: che mang pos spras pa'i shing rta sna tshhogs pa phag pa bdun la chibs pa/_phyi rol
translated: The eight nāga lords adorn his body. His hair is matted and stands upward. His face bares its fangs. He is adorned with a head ornament of eight dried skulls. A garland of fresh heads hangs from his shoulders. He is adorned with many jewels. He rides a variegated chariot drawn by seven pigs.

original: du dur khrod brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba/_shing rta'i dbus su gnas pa ni🔽skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/_rdo rje dang khab dang /_mya ngan med dang / sdigs mdzub bsnams pa/_mdog bzang po'i 'od zer can sha 'gag ser
analyzed: du dur khrod brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba/_shing rta'i dbus su gnas pa ni skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/_rdo rje dang khab dang /_mya ngan med dang / sdigs mdzub bsnams pa/_mdog bzang po'i 'od zer can sha 'gag ser
translated: In the center of the chariot,

original: po/_sna tshhogs kyi rin po ches brgyan pa/_stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs
analyzed: po/_sna tshhogs kyi rin po ches brgyan pa/_stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs
translated: seated in the cross-legged posture, is the goddess, holding a vajra, a needle, an aśoka branch, and a threatening mudrā. She is yellow Ārya Tārā, with a beautiful complexion and radiating light rays. She is adorned with various jewels and is also adorned with a tiger-skin skirt.

original: kyis kyang brgyan pa'o/_/'od dmar po las de bzhin gshegs pa lnga spro ba dang / skad cig gis bsams la snying gar nyi ma la mam gi sa bon las rnam par byung
analyzed: kyis kyang brgyan pa'o/_/'od dmar po las de bzhin gshegs pa lnga spro ba dang / skad cig gis bsams la snying gar nyi ma la mam gi sa bon las rnam par byung
translated: From the red light, the five tathāgatas emanate and are instantly visualized. At the heart, from the seed syllable maṃ, eight light rays emanate.

original: ba'i 'od zer brgyad/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par🔽bkug ste/_dbang bskur ba blangs nas rnam par snang mdzad bdag nyid kyi
analyzed: ba'i 'od zer brgyad/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par bkug ste/_dbang bskur ba blangs nas rnam par snang mdzad bdag nyid kyi
translated: The buddhas and bodhisattvas are summoned and🔽dissolve into the maṇḍala.🔽Having received the empowerment, one should visualize that the crown of the head of Vairocana is adorned with the five tathāgatas.

original: dbu rgyan du rnam par bsam par bya'o/_/de nas rnal 'byor pas 'khor lo
analyzed: dbu rgyan du rnam par bsam par bya'o/_/de nas rnal 'byor pas 'khor lo
translated: Then, the yogin should visualize the maṇḍala of the five tathāgatas in the heart of the goddess.

original: 'khor ba'i rim pa 'dis sngags kyi bzlas pa bya'o/_/om ma ri tshi mam hu~m hu~m phat
analyzed: 'khor ba'i rim pa 'dis sngags kyi bzlas pa bya'o/_/om ma ri tshi mam hu~m hu~m phat
translated: Oṃ marīci hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.

original: phat swa ha/_bzlas pa byas nas phyis kyi dus su ting nge 'dzin nye bar bsdus la
analyzed: phat swa ha/_bzlas pa byas nas phyis kyi dus su ting nge 'dzin nye bar bsdus la
translated: Having performed the recitation, later, at the time of dissolution,

original: de nyid kyi rnal 'byor gyis ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya'o/_/u /gyi 'od
analyzed: de nyid kyi rnal 'byor gyis ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya'o/_/u /gyi 'od
translated: one should remain in equipoise in the yoga of that very [goddess] as one pleases.🔽U.🔽The Sādhana of Mārīcī

original: zer can gyi sgrub thabs/_slob dpon lhan cig skyes pa'i rol pas mdzad pa🔽rdzogs so//_// pan+di ta don yod rdo rje dang /_khams pa lo tsha ba dge slong ba ris
analyzed: zer can gyi sgrub thabs/_slob dpon lhan cig skyes pa'i rol pas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_// pan+di ta don yod rdo rje dang /_khams pa lo tsha ba dge slong ba ris
translated: Composed by Ācārya Sahajavajra

original: bsgyur ba'o//_//
analyzed: bsgyur ba'o//_//
translated: is complete.🔽It was translated by the paṇḍita Amoghavajra and the Khampa Lotsāwa Gelong Baris.
